sentence.Network_en: We had to leave on the morrow .

list.abs: To - morrow or next day it might he gone ., 但也许明天或后天就结束了.
a good neighbor , a good morrow ., 好邻生好景.
A good neighbour , a good morrow ., 邻居好 , 日子好.
morrow prawn wire back : I have two newses , a good news , do you hear a bad news first which ?次日大虾回电：我有两个消息，一个好消息，一个坏消息你先听哪个？
of the night for the morrow ., 黑夜对黎明的企盼.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English morwe, from Old English morgen (see morn)

entry.def: The morrow means the next day or tomorrow.

example.ex: We do depart for Wales on the morrow.
example.tran: 我们明天确实要前往威尔士。

entry.def: Good morrow means the same as 'good morning'.

example.ex: Good morrow to you, my lord.

sentences.sentence: "whenever he arrives she leaves on the morrow"
